title: Firewall bug
body:
I cant seem to find it anywhere, and i did look, didnt go well sadly.
But is anyone else still getting firewalled like, often? almost every game often? 
Its messing my games up to the point i have to completely reset the client each time and i end up late getting leavers queue (im there start to finish, the fuck did i leave rito?)
Some help would be good cause ima cry more than amumu if this keeps up

replies.body:
What OS are you on, and who's your ISP? What city are you in?

Have you tried disabling your firewall/anti-virus, and just uninstalling them if that didn't work (be sure to have a way to reinstall)?

OS is 7 Ultimate 64x
ISP is bigpond
Melbourne
Have tried a few times
